meanings.definition: The act of designing or creating costumes for a performance or event.
meanings.sent1: The costuming for the school play was done by the drama club members.
meanings.sent2: The costuming in the movie was so elaborate and detailed.
meanings.sent3: The costuming mishap during the play rehearsal caused a lot of laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for costuming transformed the actors into believable characters.
meanings.sent5: The costuming for the ballet performance was a visual feast for the audience.

meanings.definition: The clothing worn by characters in a play or movie.
meanings.sent1: The costuming of the main character in the play was historically accurate.
meanings.sent2: The costuming for the film perfectly captured the 1920s fashion.
meanings.sent3: The costuming mix-up on set led to some hilarious scenes.
meanings.sent4: The costuming of the villain made him look menacing and intimidating.
meanings.sent5: The costuming choices reflected the characters' personalities flawlessly.

meanings.definition: The process of selecting and coordinating clothing for a particular purpose or occasion.
meanings.sent1: The costuming for the wedding was a beautiful blend of tradition and modernity.
meanings.sent2: The costuming for the fashion show was meticulously planned and executed.
meanings.sent3: The costuming dilemma before the party was finally resolved with a stylish outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for costuming made her the go-to person for styling advice.
meanings.sent5: The costuming process involved hours of fittings and adjustments to get it just right.
